results.name: 1 together with the positive squares.
comment: Also, right border of A246595 arranged as an irregular triangle.
a(n) are the Engel expansion of A070910. - _Benedict W. J. Irwin_, Dec 15 2016
formula: a(n) = 3*a(n-1)-3*a(n-2)+a(n-3) for n>=4. - _David Neil McGrath_, May 23 2015
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 12 2015
